scripts.client/build: cd client && yarn && yarn run build-t
scripts.server/build: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.server/serve: cd server && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.server/db:create: cd server && npm run db:create && cd ..
scripts.db:create: cd server && npm run db:create && cd ..
scripts.server/db:migrate: cd server && npm run db:migrate cd ..
scripts.server/db:migrate:undo: cd server && npm run db:migrate:undo cd ..
scripts.server/db:reset: cd server && npm run db:reset && cd ..
scripts.server/db:seed: cd server && npm run db:seed && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: npm run server/install && npm run server/build && npm run server/db:migrate
